name: Planet Ennea
description:
Planet Ennea is a short game made for the fourth Dream Diary Jam using the RPG Maker VX Ace engine. It focuses around a newly built robot and their desire to understand the lives and emotions of those around them. 

This demo contains 3 collectible effects (called Bodymods), three dream worlds, two endings, and various events to explore around the waking world. Also features an entire cool original soundtrack for you to vibe to B)
